value.title: U.S. to curb exports of more AI chips to China
value.excerpt: The U.S. Department of Commerce announced Tuesday that it plans to prevent the sale of more advanced artificial intelligence chips to China in the coming weeks.

value.title: US further restricts China from AI chips to hinder military development
value.excerpt: The measures aim to hamper China’s military development by closing loopholes in regulations released last October and will probably be updated “at least annually,” according to Commerce Department Secretary Gina Raimondo.

value.title: U.S. Tightens Curbs on AI Chip Exports to China, Widening Rift With Nvidia and Intel
value.excerpt: The new rules, which significantly constrict sales of advanced semiconductors to the Chinese market, came despite intense lobbying by chip companies.

value.title: Updated Chip Restrictions Help Unify AI Hype And China Hawkishness
value.excerpt: Earlier today, the Commerce Department’s Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) released rules updating last year’s chip controls targeting China.

value.title: Don’t panic, but GPU prices are starting to rise again

value.title: US Moves to Close Loopholes China Is Exploiting to Secure AI Chips
value.excerpt: The stricter rules are intended to prevent Chinese companies from obtaining large numbers of smaller chips and combining them to form a powerful data center.

value.title: Foxconn and Nvidia are building ‘AI factories’ to accelerate self-driving cars
value.excerpt: Nvidia and Foxconn are working together to build so-called “AI factories,” a new class of data centers that promise to provide supercomputing powers to accelerate the development of self-driving cars, autonomous machines and industrial robots.

value.title: Exclusive: US tackles loopholes in curbs on AI chip exports to China
value.excerpt: The steps are intended to prevent American chipmakers from selling products to China that circumvent government restrictions as part of the administration's actions to block more AI chip exports.

value.title: Mac users are embracing AI apps, study finds, with 42% using AI apps daily

value.title: The 12 Worst Examples of Meta's Dystopian AI Influencers
value.excerpt: Tom Brady, Kendall Jenner, Roy Choi, and Charli D'Amelio all throw their hats in the ring to put faces to Meta's chatbots on Instagram, Messenger, and WhatApp.

value.title: Exclusive: US tackles loopholes in curbs on AI chip exports to China
value.excerpt: The steps are intended to prevent American chipmakers from selling products to China that circumvent government restrictions as part of the administration's actions to block more AI chip exports.

value.title: U.S. tackles loopholes in curbs on AI chip exports to China
value.excerpt: The new rules will be added to sweeping U.S. restrictions on shipments of advanced chips and chipmaking equipment to China unveiled last October.

value.title: The company powering the AI revolution is quite happy to let staff keep WFH
value.excerpt: Nvidia, which makes chips used for AI software like ChatGPT, says flexible work helps attract and retain staff and lets them balance their "personal and work obligations."

value.title: AI working groups recommend setting up 24,500 GPUs of compute infra
value.excerpt: Working groups formed by the government on artificial intelligence on Friday recommended setting up a three-tier compute infrastructure comprising 24,500 graphics processing units.

value.title: Nvidia Will Release the Best AI Chips Faster. Buy the Stock.
value.excerpt: BofA Global Research analyst Vivek Arya reiterated his "Top Pick" Buy rating for the stock and reaffirmed his target of $650 for the price.

value.title: Exclusive-Biden considers extending AI chip curbs to Chinese companies abroad
value.excerpt: The Biden administration is considering closing a loophole that gives Chinese companies access to American artificial intelligence (AI) chips through units located overseas, according to four people familiar with the matter.

value.title: India's AI programme to achieve $1 trillion digital economy: Chandrasekhar
value.excerpt: "This is a deep, multi-year roadmap to make Indian AI work for being a kinetic enabler of the trillion dollar digital economy," Chandrasekhar said. The minister had earlier said the government plans to make India a USD 1-trillion digital economy by 2026.

value.title: Energy Dept. funded JetCool nets $17M to disrupt chip cooling as AI workloads surge
value.excerpt: JetCool's technology is enabling 30% faster processing while reducing energy consumption by 50% and water usage by 90% over air cooling.

value.title: AI industry set to use as much energy as countries like Sweden or the Netherlands, study finds
value.excerpt: AI comes with a huge carbon footprint and its development could see the industry's energy consumption match levels of an entire country by 2027, a study has found.

value.title: AMD to acquire Nod.ai to boost open source AI software capabilities
value.excerpt: “The acquisition of Nod.ai is expected to significantly enhance our ability to provide AI customers with open software that allows them to easily deploy highly performant AI models tuned for AMD hardware,” Vamsi Boppana, senior vice president of Artificial Intelligence Group at AMD, said in a statement.

value.title: Bank Of America Identifies 6 Global AI Stocks As 'Hidden Gems' With Great Potential
value.excerpt: Bank of America has highlighted five global stocks poised to profit as the application of artificial intelligence (AI) continues to burgeon. The bank projects significant growth potential for “end-device AI,” a deviation from the current server-based systems.

value.title: China may have access to powerful AI chips because of partnership with Saudi Arabia, claims report

value.title: Qualcomm Teases Snapdragon X Chips As AI PC Battle Heats Up With Intel And AMD
value.excerpt: Qualcomm said its upcoming Snapdragon X chips for PCs will contain the legally contested custom Oryon CPU design, setting the stage for increased rivalry against Intel and AMD.
